item.title: ボストン・グローブ・メディアとニューイングランド・スポーツ・ネットワークが平日のニュース・スポーツ番組「Boston Globe Today」を開始、NESN、Globe.com、各アプリで視聴可能（ボストン・グローブ・メディア・グループ）
item.description:
Boston Globe Media Group:
Boston Globe Media and New England Sports Network launch Boston Globe Today, a weekday news and sports show, available on NESN, Globe.com and their apps  —  Weekday program jointly produced by Boston Globe Media and NESN to debut today at 5pm ET on NESN, the NESN 360 app, Globe app and Globe.com

item.title: オクラホマ州知事は、新聞社がジャーナリストの殺害や黒人のリンチについて語った音声を公開した後、4人の職員に辞任を要求した（Liam Scott/Voice of America）
item.description:
Liam Scott / Voice of America:
Oklahoma's governor calls for four officials to resign after a newspaper released audio of the group talking about killing journalists and lynching Black people  —  Oklahoma Governor Kevin Stitt is calling for the resignation of four state officials after a local newspaper released …

item.title: Netflixは、2月にカナダ、ニュージーランド、ポルトガル、スペインで開始した後、2023年第2四半期に米国を含む有料共有プランの「幅広い展開」を計画している（Todd Spangler/Variety)
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Netflix plans a “broad rollout” of its paid sharing plan in Q2 2023, including to the US, after its Canada, New Zealand, Portugal, and Spain launch in February  —  Netflix said it would stage a “broad rollout” of its paid-sharing plan in the second quarter of 2023, including in the U.S.

item.title: ネットフリックス第1四半期：売上高は前年同期比4％増の$8.16B、有料純増数は1.8M、予想206M、2022年第1四半期は-0.2M、世界のストリーミング有料会員数は前年同期比5％増の232.5M（Reuters）
item.description:
Reuters:
Netflix Q1: revenue up 4% YoY to $8.16B, 1.8M paid net additions, vs. 2.06M est. and -0.2M in Q1 2022, and global streaming paid memberships up 5% YoY to 232.5M  —  Netflix Inc (NFLX.O) on Tuesday reported first-quarter revenue and earnings roughly in line with Wall Street expectations …

item.title: Fox Corpとそのケーブルネットワークは、Dominion Voting Systemsに$787.5Mを支払い、Dominionの機械に関するFoxの嘘に関する名誉毀損訴訟を解決することに合意した（CNBC）。
item.description:
CNBC:
Fox Corp and its cable networks agree to pay $787.5M to Dominion Voting Systems to settle the defamation lawsuit over Fox's lies about Dominion's machines  —  WILMINGTON, Del. - Fox Corp. and its cable networks agreed Tuesday to pay $787.5 million to Dominion Voting Systems to settle …

item.title: Netflixは、25年間にわたり番組や映画を加入者に郵送し、ストリーミングへの道を切り開いてきたが、2023年9月に最後の赤いDVD封筒を発送する予定だ（Sarah Krouse/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Sarah Krouse / Wall Street Journal:
Netflix plans to ship its last red DVD envelopes in September 2023, after 25 years of mailing shows and movies to subscribers and paving the way for streaming  —  Streamer said mailed DVDs paved the way for shift to streaming  —  Netflix Inc. NFLX .31%increase; green up pointing triangle …

item.title: 英語でセルフパブリッシングを行う著者2,261人を対象にした調査によると、2022年の収入の中央値は前年比53％増の12,749ドル、平均値は同34％増の82,600ドルとなった（Jim Milliot/Publishers Weekly）。
item.description:
Jim Milliot / Publishers Weekly:
A survey of 2,261 authors who self-publish in English finds the median income grew 53% YoY in 2022 to $12,749 and the average income grew 34% YoY to $82,600  —  A survey commissioned by the Alliance of Independent Authors (ALLi) found that income from self-published authors increased substantially …

item.title: NexstarのNewsNationは、4月24日に昼間の新しいニュース番組ブロックを開始し、週5日、24時間のニュース報道を行う予定です（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Nexstar's NewsNation plans to launch a new daytime block of news programming on April 24, bringing the network to 24 hours of news coverage, five days per week  —  NewsNation will debut a new daytime block of news programming next Monday that will bring the network to 24 hours of news …

item.title: Samsung、Samsung FreeアプリをSamsung Newsに刷新、カスタムニュースフィード、朝夕のトップニュースブリーフィング、ポッドキャストを提供、米国で展開（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Samsung rebrands its Samsung Free app as Samsung News, offering custom news feeds, morning and evening top news briefings, and podcasts, rolling out in the US  —  Samsung announced today that it's introducing a “Samsung News” app that gives users access to everyday news from a variety of publications.

item.title: 元Fox NewsプロデューサーのAbby Grossbergは、最近、DominionのFoxに対する訴訟に関連する証拠をさらに見つけ、それを裁判所に提出する予定であると述べている（Jane C. Timm/NBC News）。
item.description:
Jane C. Timm / NBC News:
Ex-Fox News producer Abby Grossberg says she recently found more evidence relevant to Dominion's lawsuit against Fox and plans to turn it over to the court  —  Abby Grossberg said in a new sworn statement that she recently found two more recordings on an old cellphone, which she alleges Fox News lawyers failed to search.

item.title: ブラックカルチャーのキュレーションコンテンツを提供する無料広告付きストリーミングサービスとコンテンツアグリゲーターのMansaが$8Mシードでステルスからローンチ（Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Lauren Forristal / TechCrunch:
Mansa, a free, ad-supported streaming service and content aggregator that offers curated Black cultural content, launches out of stealth with an $8M seed  —  Mansa, a free ad-supported streaming service and content aggregator that offers a curated selection of Black cultural content, launched out of stealth today.

item.title: アイルランドの放送局RTÉは、2023年7月にディー・フォーブスの後任として、Ofcom Group Director of Broadcasting and Online Content Kevin Bakhurstを次期DGに任命した（Sinéad Crowley/RTÉ ）。
item.description:
Sinéad Crowley / RTÉ:
Irish broadcaster RTÉ appoints Ofcom Group Director of Broadcasting and Online Content Kevin Bakhurst as its next DG, taking over from Dee Forbes in July 2023  —  Media executive Kevin Bakhurst has been appointed as the next Director General of RTÉ.

item.title: スウェーデンのスヴェリゲス・ラジオがツイッターアカウントの「停止または削除」を計画、PBSとCBCがやめた後、欧州の大きな公共放送局として初めてとなる（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
Sweden's Sveriges Radio plans to “deactivate or delete” its Twitter accounts, becoming the first big European public broadcaster to do so after PBS and CBC quit  —  Swedish Radio announced on Tuesday it was quitting Twitter, the first major European public broadcaster to join three …

item.title: Sonos、企業がライセンス規定に違反することなく多数の場所で音楽を再生できるサービス「Sonos Pro」を1カ所あたり月額35ドルで提供開始（Chris Welch/The Verge）
item.description:
Chris Welch / The Verge:
Sonos launches Sonos Pro, a service that lets businesses play music across numerous locations without breaking licensing rules, for $35 per month per location  —  Maybe the long-rumored Sonos headphones aren't coming this year after all.  A few months ago, CEO Patrick Spence announced …

item.title: DominionとFoxの名誉毀損裁判がデラウェア州高等裁判所でキックオフ、DominionがFoxが故意に同社に関する嘘を放送したと訴えてから2年以上（NBCニュース）
item.description:
NBC News:
Dominion-Fox defamation trial kicks off in Delaware Superior Court, more than two years after Dominion accused Fox of knowingly airing lies about the company  —  Ex-Fox News producer Abby Grossberg said she recently found more evidence relevant to Dominion Voting Systems' defamation lawsuit …
